spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning is roughly correct (kitchen top-left, dining top-right, living right/bottom-right, stair bottom-left, bath near center), but multiple openings do not match the plan. Bathroom door position/orientation is wrong, the dining-side top opening is not represented as in plan, and several window locations/counts differ. Bathroom and stair areas appear scaled differently than the 2D proportions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is mostly preserved (open kitchen/dining/living; bath central; stair left), but the opening layout deviates: a required exterior door on the left wall of the kitchen is missing, and the bathroom entry relationship to the main space is incorrect due to door relocation. Several window/door elements appear substituted (door vs window) relative to the plan. No extra enclosed rooms are added, but multiple elements are effectively hallucinated/substituted as different opening types.

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D plan provides essentially no furniture layout to match. The 3D adds a full living room set (sofa, chair, coffee table, TV console) and dining set without a corresponding 2D reference, making placement/scale unverifiable and effectively speculative.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera is a clean isometric-style view with good readability. Lighting is simple but adequate; geometry is generally clean. However, the scene reads more like a generic interior than a precise architectural translation (opening substitutions and scale feel reduce technical clarity/faithfulness).

detected_errors.description: Missing exterior door on the left wall of the kitchen shown in the 2D plan (render shows no matching door on that wall).
Bathroom door is misplaced: plan shows bathroom entry on the left side of the bathroom core; render places the bathroom door on a different face (front/bottom-facing wall).
Top-wall dining opening type/orientation mismatch: plan indicates a double-door opening at the top-right; render shows a window (not a double-door) in that location.
Window placement/count mismatch along the right exterior wall: the plan’s right-wall window configuration does not match the render’s openings.
Bathroom proportion distortion: the plan labels a very small bathroom (3' x 2'); the rendered bathroom volume appears significantly larger relative to surrounding spaces.
Stair proportion/configuration distortion: stair footprint/geometry in the render does not clearly match the plan’s stair run/landing layout.
Hallucinated interior elements not specified in the 2D plan (living room sofa/chair/coffee table/TV console and detailed dining set).
